messages:
Name: Ianis Hagi
Nationality: Romania
Date of Birth: October 22, 1998
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Deportivo Alavés
LaLiga clubs played for: Deportivo Alavés

Deportivo Alavés midfielder Ianis Hagi has played in the majority of the team's LaLiga games in 2023/2024, making 22 appearances overall and playing 798 minutes. He has started in eight of these appearances across their 38 fixtures and been mainly used off the bench as a substitute on 14 occasions.

Hagi last featured in a LaLiga game on May 26, playing 90 minutes for Deportivo Alavés against Las Palmas in a 1-1 draw. This season he has provided two LaLiga assists. He has amassed three yellow cards.
Hagi played eight Premiership games last season for Rangers and scored one goal.

Hagi linked up with Deportivo Alavés on loan in August 2023 from Rangers, for whom he has made 56 league appearances in total, scoring 10 goals and providing 11 assists, after joining the club in July 2020 from Genk.

It was on September 2, 2023 that Hagi made his LaLiga debut, aged 24 years and 315 days, against Valencia. So far in his LaLiga career, he has played 22 times in the competition, with two assists, and he is still awaiting a first goal.
